metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4055 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The duration function in the moment package before 2.11.2 for Node.jsallows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) viaa long string, aka a "regular expression Denial of Service (ReDoS)."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4055` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjs-moment - 2.20.1+ds-1
node-moment - 2.20.1+ds-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-moment package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.20.1+ds-1').
